website_summaries.verdict: If you know a kid who is completely captivated by speedy vehicles, this large LEGO set will test their creativity as they piece together the coolest ride they can imagine.
pros: Build your choice of a twin-rotor helicopter, hovercraft, or supersonic jet
Challenging and engaging models to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully challenging for my 7 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: The helicopter was a real (good) challenge for my grandson (age 7). It took him 6 hours, and he even skipped one of his favorite meals, to complete the assembly, asking for assistance once only on a technical point. He wanted to understand the physics of how the crank in the tail moves the blades and how the power can be transmitted to the two propellers. A real lesson with hand-on experience. One assembled, he quickly disassembled it top use some of the parts in other creations of his, reflecting his whimsy and creativity. Definitely a fabulous set for a young one.
customer_reviews.author: MJL

customer_reviews.title: Probably a nice kit but...
customer_reviews.text: Once again Amazon thinking that they'll save money by shipping the item in its original box. This theory is fine if the item being shipped too big to be boxed. This doesn't work if youth purchase the item for a surprise gift that lives in the same household. There's a good chance they'll see it. In addition collectible items with shipping labels attached to them will damage the box when removed. I know Amazon gives the option if one wants to have the item to be shipped with a box, but they should highlight the option or make it more visible to the buyer. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge!
customer_reviews.text: This was lots bigger than I thot it would be. The functions on this set is really cool. Different than other LEGO sets we own. For the helicopter the door slides open. There is a knob to twist the rope up and down. And another knob to spin the rotors. And for the jet you can change the wing angle a little. We haven’t done the last one yet. But if you want something to preoccupy your kid during this quarantine this toy works. Keeps them occupied for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Ultbruin

customer_reviews.title: A good build for lego
customer_reviews.text: Got this as something I wanted to try to build. Opened it and started building it. 3 hours later I had it done. It was actually a fun build and an older child should have no problem with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ellifson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lego project
customer_reviews.text: While all Lego products are very expensive, they fall perfectly in line with other hobbies of mine... expensive! That said, I loved putting the Twin Rotor Helicopter together. It was a nice challenge.
customer_reviews.author: The Edmiester

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool Lego set, for parents and their kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool set, with working rotors, a winch, or flaps on the plane. It's pretty cool, because the parts actually build basic gearboxes to move the parts. It takes a little while to assemble, but you kind of expect that with sets this size.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: What I got wasn't a lego set. It was a mosquito net. How the hell do you get those mixed up?? I'm not paying 2x more for a mosquito net that I don't even need.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Best price over Target or other stores
customer_reviews.text: This order was a gift for our grandson. He loved it, but best of all I loved the price over other sellers. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: LEGO saves parents! My son loves it. He usually gets tired of LEGO after couple days. But for creative, we just keep dissembling and resembling, and he has triple joy
customer_reviews.author: Fangzhou L.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Teenage Son
customer_reviews.text: My son just loves legos and requested a "helicopter set." We looked at several different styles and he choose this one because of the versatility and the multiple different designs he could make instead of just a helicopter. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego build
customer_reviews.text: My son lost his mind totally when he saw this Lego creator helicopter! Great gift and fun to build!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaS

customer_reviews.title: Kept them busy for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved building the different designs. They were challenging to build but my kids really enjoyed it! Great LEGO set and I would highly recommend for 7+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cargo choppers ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a very intresting twin rotor/osprey hybrid of a build, it is a 100% enjoyable if you wanna militarize it if you wanna add guns or what not to it to give it an immersive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Salahedin

customer_reviews.title: Great lego set
customer_reviews.text: Great lego set. My has played with it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Faith C. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun assembling!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening on Christmas morning our grandson began assembling the helicopter.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Buildable and a playable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and has been enjoying playing with it after he built it. Double win!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Free

customer_reviews.title: Missing main piece for plane
customer_reviews.text: So sad we got to the end of the build only to find out the white cylinder part that the propeller connects to was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Gu

customer_reviews.title: Better for children than watching tv.
customer_reviews.text: Feed your children's minds just like you do their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Viney

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: The outcome was better than expected as it was a large helicopter once completed. My 6 year old could figure it out and is extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aminda

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Excellent. More than 3 in 1. Creative has not limit. With power function along side, it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: VIGY ZACHARIAH

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friends son and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for kids across different ages. The 3in1 adds more playtime to the kit, and it also has some basic mechanics that makes it more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love legos and this was a great deal !
customer_reviews.author: L. Violet

customer_reviews.title: Really cool 3 in 1 Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set gives you a choice of three different types of vehicles to make. There are not enough pieces to make all three at once, so you will need to make them one at a time, taking them apart when you want to rebuild something else. If you want to "save the best for last" I suggest you make the vehicles in the following order: the boat, the jet, then the magnificent helicopter. The helicopter is clearly the best because it not only is the biggest, but it has the most fun features. This would make a great Christmas or birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Fun factor of ten time THREE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG lego set! Obviously meant for an older child or adult but certainly can be a Dad/younger child project. I recommend separating the pieces by color first for less confusion but that's just me. Besides Lego's genius in design as usual, the real fun is that this set can be broken down and rebuilt into THREE different things, a helicopter, a jet and a hover craft! Usually my grandson wants to take his project apart shortly after building and rebuild...this give you two more options...genius! Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L Parr

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: The Lego set itself is very well designed, and the pieces are very unique. My son says that Legos are always great because they are Legos. No matter what the child is building, he or she is actively engaged in the creation, learning building skills and properties of structures and improving fine motor skills--and then has the fun of playing with the creation. This is an awesome, solidly built set that has lots of playability and just looks fabulous. The wings click into place and the model stands strong by itself. The figures are great! All in all, a great set, solid build and great figures.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 3 Builds In One
customer_reviews.text: As you’d expect, this is a good quality set with amazing, very visual instructions. Actually, it has three booklets if very visual instructions - one each for the three builds you can make with the contents. I really do prefer one build per box, as then they can separate the bricks into different bags. That makes for such less frustration if you’re working with younger kids. They get so frustrated trying to find the pieces they need! In any event, this is a cool set if you have a military vehicle enthusiast in your life.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewToaKill

customer_reviews.title: Thup Thup Thup Thup Thup
customer_reviews.text: I love LEGO! To be fair, who doesn't? This kit basically comes with everything you need to build 1 of 3 designs: Helicopter, Jet, and Hover-boat. Each design took less than an hour to build, with clear and concise directions. It's a pretty standard LEGO set. You really can't go wrong when buying LEGO's. Even if you don't entirely like this design, you can literally build anything you can imagine. Price is about standard for the amount of pieces you get. Perfect gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: MadROMAD

customer_reviews.title: 3 builds in 1 set
customer_reviews.text: You can build a helicopter, jet, or hovercraft with this set. Not all 3 at once but one at a time. This is a great set and is hours upon hours of building fun which is wonderful for keeping kids off screens and using their creative and problem solving skills. Perfectly giftable and great for both boys and girls. At the time of this review the retail price was under $60 which is reasonable for the quality and functionality of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Put Together!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a little of a challenge as it has several moving parts so was much more than more than just a model. 11 y.o grandson thinks this was fun to put together and didn't take that a lot of time while he had the TV on too. The helicopter has a sliding door, twin rotors that work together, a wench that will lower and retrieve the rover. He likes the the Rover that's part of the kit. Expensive IMHO but is a special gift.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: What a LEGO kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains 569 pieces and is for kids who have built LEGO kits and can follow instructions, which are included. With the pieces, you can build three different designs - a helicopter, a jet or a hovercraft. This gives you much more use in making designs. As a twin rotor helicopter, it has synchronized rotors, opening cargo bay and working winch. This is a kit that will keep a person entertained for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun build that can be played with afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Fun, easy to build design that can be played with afterwards. The instructions are clear and accurate, the only confusing part might be that this particular set (because it is three in one) doesn't have numbered bags. Pieces are a tad mixed between each bag so you have to do a bit of searching (more than usual). Overall this was an enjoyable set to build though!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Build one, disassemble, build another!
customer_reviews.text: A fun project! The way the blades moved was a clever design. I would love to see more Lego products like this. It's a 3-in-1 build, so you can disassemble and build again as something else. The gear design is complex and a good challenge to assemble. It took 3-4 hours to assemble the helicopter. Can't wait to build the other two designs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3IN1
customer_reviews.text: The 3IN1 Lego sets are always a huge hit in this house. My 6 year old loves to build these & then take apart & build again. These are great for playing, fine motor, and learning to follow instructions. Really awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how one company could so consistently impress, but they do every time. My kids chose to build the helicopter and it was working rotors, which was really cool. It's quite sizeable as well. The other creator sets we've gotten have been smaller. They were able to put it together without any help. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: 3 builds but you can only build one at a time
customer_reviews.text: Very cool set this set comes with 3 different builds. Out of the 3 I built the Hoover craft. Although there are 3 different builds you can only build one. The directions are clear to ready and easy to follow along with. This set would make a great gift or model for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: joseph otto

customer_reviews.title: Great for lego lovers
customer_reviews.text: Got this as something I wanted to try to build. Opened it and started building it. 3 hours later I had it done. It was actually a fun build and an older child should have no problem with this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Another fun Legos kit made for big boys
customer_reviews.text: My husband and our next door neighbor had a few adult beverages and are working on putting it together. My husband was amazed as what Legos has done with plastic pieces. Fun kit and well made. Good times are being had assembling this kit.
customer_reviews.author: FiFi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s LEGO’s! Who doesn’t love legos?! This is a nice little set, that isn’t too complex, so it was nice that my daughter could do most of it with little help from me.
customer_reviews.author: IAmanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these 3-in-1s. Definitely give me more value. The helicopter is super cool, but honestly, the plane might be the best. I like all 3 builds! High quality as always. What's not to love??
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator 3in1 Twin Rotor Helicopter 31096 Building Kit (569 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Prepare for fast-moving air and sea adventures with the LEGO Creator 3in1 31096 Twin Rotor Helicopter. This cool toy for kids features huge synchronized rotors with super-realistic functionality, plus a tinted cockpit with 2 seats, sliding side door and an opening rear cargo bay. Turn the gear wheel to spin the rotors and use the working winch to deliver the included ROV submarine. With LEGO Creator 3in1 playsets children get 3 different creative play experiences. Build the Twin Rotor Helicopter and then rebuild it into a Jet or a Hovercraft toy for more high-speed action. Includes a pilot minifigure, ready for adventure.
feature_bullets: Kids get to build and rebuild 3 models with this LEGO Creator 3in1 set. Create the Twin Rotor Helicopter and then rebuild it for more high-speed action with a superfast Jet or a cool toy Hovercraft!

The Twin Rotor Helicopter has lots of realistic features that kids will love, including large spinnable, synchronized rotors, 2-man cockpit, opening side and rear cargo bay doors, working winch and a transportable ROV.
With 3 alternative builds, this 569-piece LEGO Creator 3in1 set will keep boys and girls over 8 years old, and big kids of all ages, entertained for hours.

This LEGO Creator 3in1 Twin Rotor Helicopter 31096 playset is the perfect gift for fans of high-speed vehicles and can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building and extended play.

Helicopter measures over 6” (17cm) high, 14” (37cm) long and 12” (33cm) wide Jet measures over 3” (8cm) high, 10” (26cm) long and 10” (27cm) wide Hovercraft measures over 3” (9cm) high, 7” (20cm) long and 3” (8cm) wide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars206 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
